author: stsp
msg: Revert r1099616. We want to keep the warning in place, but word it a bit
differently to avoid ambiguity now that commit respects --depth for copies
in a way. The warning will be rephrased in a follow-up commit.
Discussed with Julian and Bert on IRC.
